"My Shop Master/My Shop Buyer":
"Earning the Title マイショップマスター (My Shop Master) unlocks the following features:

・Advertisement editing under My Shop Management"

"Earning the Title マイショップバイヤー (My Shop Buyer) unlocks the following features:

・The ability to search for specific shops

Only sellers with the My Shop Master title will appear on this listing."

"In addition, in interactions between a seller with My Shop Master and a buyer with My Shop Buyer, the following options become available:

・The ability to view My Shop Details when searching for products
・The ability to view the other player's Player ID from Sales Confirmations
・You can send a Good Job when purchasing a product"
